methods.description: Retrieves summary country information for the provided marketId and filters

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: MarketId in which the request is being made, and for which responses should be localized

parameters.name: regionTypeId
parameters.description: Restrict countries to this region type; required if regionName is supplied

parameters.name: regionName
parameters.description: Restrict countries to this region name; required if regionTypeId is supplied

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The term to sort the result countries by.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The direction to sort the result countries by.

methods.description: Retrieves country and summary state information for provided countryKey

parameters.name: marketId
parameters.description: MarketId in which the request is being made, and for which responses should be localized

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The term to sort the result country states by.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The direction to sort the result country states by.
